text: Unlike most other modules, mod_rewrite does not allow global inheritance of its rules. One can specify RewriteOptions Inherit for child configs, but there's no way to make all children inherit rules from a parent.
creator: Chaosed0@gmail.com
Chaosed0@gmail.com

Patch against trunk

Note: Wasn't sure exactly what to put in the documentation for the version that these options would be available in. I put in 2.4.8, as a placeholder/guess.
